BodyName: Committee on Governmental Operations, State & Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Jackson, S.1891, and Assembly Member Cunningham, A.4523, “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to owner liability for failure of an operator to comply with street cleaning parking rules; to amend the public officers law, in relation to access to records prepared pursuant to street cleaning parking rules; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Owner liability for failure of an operator to comply with street cleaning parking rules (S.1891/A.4523)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Jackson S.6486, and Assembly Member Pheffer Amato A.6942, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the restoration of 20 year service retirement for certain New York city corrections officers and sanitation workers.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Restoration of 20 year service retirement for certain New York city corrections officers and sanitation workers (S.6486/A.6942).

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Gounardes S.6640, and Assembly Member Pheffer Amato A.6784, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to death benefits for active New York city transit authority members.”
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Death benefits for active New York city transit authority members (S.6640/A.6784).

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Jackson, S.6988-A, and Assembly Member Rajkumar, A.1778-C, “AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to granting members of the city's police force eligibility for retirement and pension based on previous service as traffic enforcement agents”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Granting members of the city's police force eligibility for retirement and pension based on previous service as traffic enforcement agents (S.6988-A/ A.1778-C).

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Jackson, S.1891, and Assembly Member Cunningham, A.4523, “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to owner liability for failure of an operator to comply with street cleaning parking rules; to amend the public officers law, in relation to access to records prepared pursuant to street cleaning parking rules; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof”.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this SLR be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Owner liability for failure of an operator to comply with street cleaning parking rules (S.1891/A.4523)
